Nigthlight:

Her healing was progresing, but in spite of her stasis lock, N=
ighlight's programs rejects every attempt of Watchers to reprogram her. It =
was as if her calmed down nature together her love of Rodimus and her daugh=
ter gave her enough streng to fight this.

The Cr's buzzed, and showed its =
report, she was in stasis 100% repaired, but machine wasn't able to reprogr=
am her. 
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Richard Allen 
  To: nbwrp=
g@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, July 17, 2005 4:27 PM
  Subject: Re: A l=
ittle girl lost


  : : The Watchers : :
  Elita had awoken too late. The f=
our Watchers hand taken her parents, Rodimus and Nightlight, to their base.=
 They were now in CR chambers being repaired... and reprogrammed.

  Little=
 Elita was alone.
